name: Terminal Eternity
description:
A demo for our project called Terminal Eternity. It follows a young married couple who work at a hospital. A disaster strikes in the form of a storm, providing an escape for a violent criminal, and all sorts of unknown horrors...

After you've played the demo, please take our survey to give feedback on how best we can improve the game! It's still a work in progress after all. If you like what you see feel free to leave a tip or a comment of encouragement! God bless!

Survey Link: https://forms.gle/U4K9rco3aCR9Ux4x6
